00063     inline void setChannelPositions(QValueList<int> positions){
00064      channelPositions.clear();
00065      QValueList<int>::iterator iterator;
00066      for(iterator = positions.begin(); iterator != positions.end(); ++iterator)
00067       channelPositions.append(*iterator);
00068     };
00069 
00071     inline void setNbChannels(int nb){nbChannels = nb;};

00083     inline bool isCrashRecovery() const{return crashRecovery;};
00084 
00086     inline int crashRecoveryInterval() const{
00087      switch(crashRecoveryIndex){
00088       case 0:
00089         return 1;
00090       case 1:
00091         return 3;
00092       case 2:
00093         return 5;
00094       case 3:
00095         return 15;
00096       case 4:
00097         return 30;
00098       default:
00099         return 1;
00100      }           
00101     };
